testcase.name: respondToBooking should confirm booking and update slot status when accepted()
createBooking should save booking with isRecurring true()
completeBooking should create new slot 7 days later for recurring bookings()
createBooking should throw exception when slot not found()
createBooking should throw exception when slot is not available()
createBooking should throw exception when slot already has confirmed booking()
createBooking should create and save a booking when all validations pass()
createBooking should throw exception when client already has booking for slot()
respondToBooking should reject booking without changing slot status when rejected()
